prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

LIGHTING: day time - use appropriate day lighting (bright, natural sunlight)

STYLE CONSISTENCY (use reference for style only, NOT content):
- Match the art style, color palette from reference
- Character: same appearance (hair, clothes) but NEW pose for this action
- Do NOT copy or trace the reference image
- Mina must not react visibly to the spirit.

SCENE:
- Location: The School Hallway - Normal to others, but a horror show for Mina. The lighting shifts when she focuses on spirits.- Shot: close-up shot focusing on face and expressions
- Angle: high angle looking down, shows vulnerability or overview

CHARACTERS (draw with correct human anatomy and proportions):
- Character 'Mina Kim' (short black bob hair, pale skin, large white headphones, oversized beige cardigan, tired dark circles under eyes) - Expression: scared - Position: left of frame

ACTION: A distorted, smoky hand reaches out from a locker right next to Mina's face. Mina clutches her backpack straps tighter, eyes squeezed slightly shut.

FORMAT:
- FULL BLEED: artwork extends to ALL edges, no white borders
- No speech bubbles or text in the image

QUALITY:
- Clean linework, correct anatomy and body proportions
- Expressive faces, dynamic poses
- Professional webtoon art quality

panel_data.action: A distorted, smoky hand reaches out from a locker right next to Mina's face. Mina clutches her backpack straps tighter, eyes squeezed slightly shut.
panel_data.continuity_note: Mina must not react visibly to the spirit.
